    TALENTS are the coin created within the PayMHO platform through our PoC (Proof of CraftÂ®) technology. TALENTs are awarded to an INFLUENCER that submits a useful post. Think of TALENTS as the transformation of your content and profile information into something of value. These TALENTS can be converted into ideal coin or fiat currency. TALENTS will accrue value at a sustainable rate since they are strictly confined to the PayMHO platform.

FAQ’s
Who will take care of the information?
Identity theft â€“ legal and illegal â€“ is the modern method of profiting from the work and knowledge of others. The new phenomenon of cyber theft â€“ whether data is given willingly (by signing in accordance in online platforms) or taken without your authorization â€“ is ENGAGED IN by institutions, governments, individuals or companies who exploit your data for their benefit.
Why digital currencies? What's happening?
During the last three years, the use and investment in digital platforms has been opened to the public domain.

The global euphoria has been such that all platforms consolidated within the specifications of CRYPTOCURRENCY have provided their investors with profits well above the norm, even far above what was anticipated by the platforms themselves.

The majority of these platforms generate VALUE, providing services to other platforms in the same line. The key to their versatility and use is that they are transferable and can be exchanged for products and services. These are not necessarily high-value, but demand increases prices.

Millions of people and businesses have seen their investments multiply. This is a new way of doing business, one in which anyone with a computer, bank account and basic knowledge of the platforms can make a fortune on a small investment in a relatively short time. It is a safe environment: one in which all the participants contribute, causing investments to increase, and guaranteeing integrity, security and simplicity.

12 months ago, MOST CRYPTOCURRENCIES were worth 10% of their current value.
KYC
While our platform protects the identity of its INFLUENCERS, they must all be registered with proof of identity. They must be subject to international law as well as to those that apply in their country of residence.
Information for all Influencers
Terms and Conditions: USE OF COINS AND TOKENS. All rights of use of the digital currencies will be property of THE INFLUENCERS. Acquirers will have absolute ownership of the digital currencies and the use thereof will be the responsibility of the owners. Owners of the digital currencies are subject to the legal terms of the country in which the currencies are used. You accumulate coins called TALENTS, which you can market around the world as you see fit. Its parity is with GOLD, meaning that it maintains its value over time and in all territories. Its value is supported by the information it holds jointly among all INFLUENCERS.
